title: Natural Logarithm
text: lnx is the same as loge(x).

title: Simplify
text: Simplify $$\operatorname{loge}\left(\sqrt{2}\right)$$ with a calculator. You may have to type $$\sqrt{2}$$ as $$2^{0.5}$$.

title: Round
text: We get $$0.1505$$. To round to nearest thousandth, we check that the third decimal place is less or equal $$\frac{to}{greater}$$ than $$5$$. If equal $$\frac{to}{greater}$$ than $$5$$, we round up to the next thousandth.
